newsitem.title: USA: Excel CFO McLaine named president/COO.
newsitem.headline: Excel CFO McLaine named president/COO.

text.p: Excel Communications Inc said on Monday it has named Chief Financial Officer John McLaine to the president's post and the newly created position of chief operating officer.
McLaine will continue to hold the chief financial officer's title until that position is filled, the company said.
He succeeds Kenny Troutt, the founder of the company who remains as chief executive and chairman.
Dallas-based Excel is a long-distance telecommunications company.
